content: resource/img/d/v/n.png POMEGRANADE BODY LOTION Intense Hydrating & Nourishing Body Lotion This fast absorbing anti-aging body lotion helps to rebuild and strengthen the skin. It stimulates collagen production, vital for regeneration and repair of skin tissue. Enriched with a firming hexapeptide Peptamide-6 and an age-defying antioxidant complex of pomegranate extract and Vitamin A & E, this product combats the effects of time and defends the skin against environmental damages. Shea nut butter nourishes, hydrates and revitalizes the skin. This lightly perfumed body lotion leaves a smooth, silky feeling on the skin and improves its elasticity.
